page.title: 09A BOYS DAY
page.content: {A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A SCHOOL BOY} {Damian}usually rises at 8 am. He wears his school uniform, has a small break_ fast and is picked up outside the house by the school minibus. He arrives at school at 8.50 am. When he gets to school he has Assembly with prayers and then goes back to class. He works at Maths until break at 10.30 At break he may play football in the playground with other boys. After break he has English and Religious Education. It is a sandwich lunch with a soft drink. In the afternoon he completes an English Comprehension Card and then goes to the Park for games with his class. After games he is picked up by the school bus his school day finishes at 3.15 pm. After a cooked evening meal he might play out or stay in to watch television.
